text: Bergueneuse is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de- France region in northern France. ==Geography== A village located 28 miles (42 km) northwest of Arras at the D94 and D71 road junction. ==Population== ==Sights== * The seventeenth-century church. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Bergueneuse
